    • Method Detail

      • loadCatalog

        public static Catalog loadCatalog(org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession spark,
                                  java.lang.String name)
        Build an Iceberg Catalog to be used by this Spark source adapter.

        The cache is to facilitate reuse of catalogs, especially if wrapped in CachingCatalog. For non-Hive catalogs all custom parameters passed to the catalog are considered in the cache key. Hive catalogs only cache based on the Metastore URIs as per previous behaviour.

        Parameters:
        spark - Spark Session
        name - Catalog Name
        Returns:
        an Iceberg catalog

      • table

        public static Table table(org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession spark,
                          java.lang.String path)
